"砂漠をふらふらしませんかあ？":
"Have you grown tired of Ranger yet?
I'm not talking down to you, I just
thought it might be about time you grew
tired of it. It's times like this that
you need a change of pace!

Want to go with Lisa to kill stuff
in the Desert? It'll be so much fun!
※ Con calificación S, como Ranger,
solo con Lisa."
